answers.answer: Yay baby's good and we don't have to stay today. Glad that there's no issues today
Why do you have to get monitored if you don't mind me asking? I have to go twice weekly as well!
I'm diabetic. So high risk but I'd rather go in and make sure my little girls doing ok and take care of any issues that arise
Exactly! :) same here except I'm having a boy.
Well I also go because of preeclampsia, not diabetic but I'd rather have to go then anything else happen.
Yeah. I would much rather travel that extra hour a week and catch a serious problem early on then wait and have something happen. When are you due?
For sure. I'm due October 30th but I'll be getting induced October 7th at the latest. How about you?
I'm due October first but I have a feeling she's going to come a few days or weeks early

question: Have monitoring today again. Thinking they will admit me again this week. Hopefully baby girl stays calm and doesn't act up so we get out of here on time. But we shall see today
title: fetal monitoring
